item.description:
Jan shall the the Unknown Zone Point of Contact for this Event.

This information is from the Fall Faire Flyer.
I did make some changes for space and effect.

All proceeds will benefit the Daughters of the Nile.

Ladies & Gentlemen, step right up & bring your family & friends to the Daughters of the Nile Fall Faire.

Sit down in the Food Court & enjoy the many specialties presented at the food booth, such as meatball
& sausage grinders, liver, bacon, & onion sandwiches, hot dogs, fried dough, popcorn & beverages.

Enjoy a delicious dessert at the Pie Booth & order your Holiday pies & goodies at the same time.

Visit the Cookie Store & buy a pre-packaged mix in a jar to enjoy at your pleasure.

Meander over to the book table & find a good book for a rainy day.

Say hello to the Tall Shriner.

Have the children?s faces painted & watch them smile.

Why not visit the Penny Candy Booth & partake in some sweet treats to enjoy after the Faire?

Adults & children, try your hand at a game of skill & win a prize.

Spin the wheel at the turkey shoot & win something for Thanksgiving.

Take a chance at the spectacular Chinese Auction.

Let our Magician mesmerize you with his prestidigitation.

Who is brave enough to see who is behind the Frog Screen?

The hours are from Noon to 4:00 on Sunday, November 11.

http://www.flashback-...

www.flashback-oldies.com/Maps/Shrinmfd.gif

I am reading multiple Zip Codes.
I am used to Milford having the Zip Code of 06460.
Some sites give the Zip Code for this location as 06460 and others says 06461.
The Telephone Book agrees with me that it should be 06460, so that is what
I am going to put down.
If there was some recent Zip Code change, then it is not in the Phone
Book yet.

This event is not on the below link, but it has information about the
Pyramid Shiners Center.
